title: [A Touch of Class, Workroom]
description: The vivid colors scattered across the white vellum walls of the room are in stark contrast to the cooler tones of the previous.  A lattice-like blackthorn rack is diagonally fastened to the back wall alongside a pair of cupped blown glass hands, each filled with a variety of fabrics and dyes.
location: between Wehnimer's Landing and Zul Logoth
